content: solar relating to energy derived from the suns rays like walking on sunshine these socks are worked in the round cuff down with a heel flap using 5 dpns to fit a medium ladies foot with a cuff circumference of 18cm i ve used a skein of hand dyed 4ply 75% wool 25% acrylic from the knitters attic in oranges and lemons i hope you enjoy using this pattern i m still quite new to writing up patterns and would appreciate any feedback you may have
